description: Provides details about a batch of security controls for the current Amazon Web Services account and Amazon Web Services Region.

nested_items.name: SecurityControls
nested_items.description: An array that returns the identifier, Amazon Resource Name (ARN), and other details about a security control. The same information is returned whether the request includes SecurityControlId or SecurityControlArn.

nested_items.name: SecurityControlId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of a security control across standards. Values for this field typically consist of an Amazon Web Services service name and a number, such as APIGateway.3.

nested_items.name: SecurityControlArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for a security control across standards, such as arn:aws:securityhub:eu-central-1:123456789012:security-control/S3.1. This parameter doesn't mention a specific standard.

nested_items.name: Title
nested_items.description: The title of a security control.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of a security control across standards. This typically summarizes how Security Hub evaluates the control and the conditions under which it produces a failed finding. This parameter doesn't reference a specific standard.

nested_items.name: RemediationUrl
nested_items.description: A link to Security Hub documentation that explains how to remediate a failed finding for a security control.

nested_items.name: SeverityRating
nested_items.description: The severity of a security control. For more information about how Security Hub determines control severity, see Assigning severity to control findings in the Security Hub User Guide.

nested_items.name: SecurityControlStatus
nested_items.description: The enablement status of a security control in a specific standard.

nested_items.name: UpdateStatus
nested_items.description: Identifies whether customizable properties of a security control are reflected in Security Hub findings. A status of READY indicates that Security Hub uses the current control parameter values when running security checks of the control. A status of UPDATING indicates that all security checks might not use the current parameter values.

nested_items.name: Parameters
nested_items.description: An object that identifies the name of a control parameter, its current value, and whether it has been customized.

nested_items.name: ValueType
nested_items.description: (string) ---

nested_items.name: ValueType
nested_items.description: Identifies whether a control parameter uses a custom user-defined value or subscribes to the default Security Hub behavior.

nested_items.name: Integer
nested_items.description: A control parameter that is an integer.

nested_items.name: IntegerList
nested_items.description: A control parameter that is a list of integers.
(integer) ---

nested_items.name: Double
nested_items.description: A control parameter that is a double.

nested_items.name: String
nested_items.description: A control parameter that is a string.

nested_items.name: StringList
nested_items.description: A control parameter that is a list of strings.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Boolean
nested_items.description: A control parameter that is a boolean.

nested_items.name: Enum
nested_items.description: A control parameter that is an enum.

nested_items.name: EnumList
nested_items.description: A control parameter that is a list of enums.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: LastUpdateReason
nested_items.description: The most recent reason for updating the customizable properties of a security control. This differs from the UpdateReason field of the BatchUpdateStandardsControlAssociations API, which tracks the reason for updating the enablement status of a control. This field accepts alphanumeric characters in addition to white spaces, dashes, and underscores.

nested_items.name: UnprocessedIds
nested_items.description: A security control (identified with SecurityControlId, SecurityControlArn, or a mix of both parameters) for which details cannot be returned.

nested_items.name: SecurityControlId
nested_items.description: The control (identified with SecurityControlId, SecurityControlArn, or a mix of both parameters) for which a response couldn't be returned.

nested_items.name: ErrorCode
nested_items.description: The error code for the unprocessed security control.

nested_items.name: ErrorReason
nested_items.description: The reason why the security control was unprocessed.
